content: You are Antonio. Regarding your successfully completed an action 'wage_payment' involving Matteo., Matteo just said to you: '"Ah, thanks, Antonio! Much appreciated."' What is your brief, natural reply?
"You're very welcome, Matteo. Glad to be of service!"

You are Antonio. Regarding your successfully completed an action 'wage_payment' involving Matteo., Matteo just said to you: '"Ah, ottimo, Antonio! Much appreciated. Let's hope it keeps everyone happy."' What is your brief, natural reply?
"Prego, Matteo! Glad to hear it. Let's hope so too!"
